sources.description: Path of Exile 1 challenge leagues. Requires POE_OAUTH_TOKEN or GGG client credentials (service:leagues).
Path of Exile 2 leagues/launch. Same API, realm=poe2.
Blizzard Diablo 4 news feed. Scan items for date mentions (e.g. expansion, release).
Steam news for Last Epoch. Requires STEAM_API_KEY. Dates appear in post titles/body.
Steam news for No Rest for the Wicked.
Steam news for Torchlight Infinite (season announcements).

notes.poe: Register at https://www.pathofexile.com/developer/docs to get OAuth client; use service:leagues scope. League objects include startTime/endTime.
notes.steam_news: Free API key at https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey. GetNewsForApp returns recent news; parse titles/contents for date patterns.
notes.rss: No key required. Parse feed for <pubDate> and date-like text in titles/descriptions.
